titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3807) to amend the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to increase appropriations to the Restaurant Revitalization Fund, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3807) to amend the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to increase appropriations to the Restaurant Revitalization Fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-290, by Mr. Morelle.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3807 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 73.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1033.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mrs. Fischbach demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 206 (Roll no. 119).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 206 (Roll no. 120).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the consideration of H.R. 3807 (expanding the Restaurant Revitalization Fund, extending the qualifying expenditure period for the Shuttered Venue Operators Grant, and establishing the Hard Hit Industries Award Program).
